Translations.Text: Ami tomara (kalyanara) babe tomara buku prasasta karai diya na'ine
arau ami tomara paraa tomara boja apasarana karaa na'ine
yi boja'i tomara pithi bhani pela'ichila
arau amiye'i tomara (maryada brd'dhira) babe tomara smaranaka samunnata karaicho
Eteke dukhara lagate'i ache sukha
niscaya dukhara lagate'i ache sukha
Eteke yetiya'i tumi arasara poraa tetiya'i kathora ibadatata atmaniyoga karaa
Arau tomara pratipalakara prati gabhira manoyogi horaa
Sapata tina arau yayatunara
sapata cina'i parbatara
sapata e'i niraapada nagarakhanara
niscaya ami manuhaka sarbottama gathanata srsti karaicho
tara pichata ami taka hinatagrasthasakalara hinatamata parainata karaicho
kerala se'isakala lokara bahirae yisakale imana aniche arau satkarma karaiche; te'omlokara babe ache aphuranta subha pratidana
Eteke (he manara!) Iyara pichato kihe tomaka karmaphala dina samparke abisbasi karai tule
allahe'i bicarakasakalara majata sarbasraestha bicaraka nahayane barau
parha tomara pratipalakara namata, yiye srsti karaiche
te'om manuhaka alakbara paraa srsti karaiche
Parha, karana tomara pratipalaka mahamahima
Yijane kalamara sahayata siksa diche
Te'om manuhaka ene siksa diche, yito manuhe jana nachila
Bastarate, manuhe simalanghana karai thake
Karana si nijake sbanirbharasila buli bharae
Niscaya tomara pratipalakara ocarate'i pratyarartana
Tumi taka dekha na'ine? Yiye nisedha karae
Ejana bandaka, yetiya te'om chalata adaya karae
Koraacona, yadi'o te'om hidayatara oparata pratisthita
athaba takbaraara nirdesa diye; (tathapi'o te'omka kenekai badha diye)
koraacona yadi si (nisedhakarai) asbikara karae arau mukha ghuraa'i laya
si najane neki, niscaya allahe dekhi ache
ketiya'o nahaya, yadi si birata nathake, tente niscaya ami taka agaculita dharai tani anima
Michaliya, papisthara agaculi (kapala)
Eteke si nija paraisadaka mati anaka
Anatipalame ami mati anima jahannamara kathora praharaisakalaka
Ketiya'o nahaya, tumi tara anusarana nakaraiba. Arau tumi (tomara pratipalakaka) chajada karaa arau naikatya labha karaa
Niscaya ami iyaka la'ilatula kbadarata aratirna karaicho
tumi ki janiba la'ilatula kbadara ki
la'ilatula kbadara ehejara mahatakaiyo sraestha
Se'i raatita phiraistasakala arau rauha te'omlokara pratipalakara anumatikrame yaratiya sid'dhanta lai aratarana karae
Santimaya se'i raati, phajarara abirbhara nohoraalaike (santi bistrta thake)
Ahale kitabasakalara majata yisakale kupharai karaiche arau musbaraikasakala, sihamtara ocarata suspasta pramana nahalaike sihamte birata thakibalai prastuta nachila
Allahara taraphara paraa ejana raachula, yijane tilaraata karai sunaba paraitra patrasamuha
Ya’ta ache sathika bidhibad'dha bidhana
Arau yisakalaka kitaba diya haichila sihamte bibhakta ha’la sihamtara ocarata suspasta pramana ahara pichata

Arau sihamtaka kerala e'i nirdesa diya haichila ye, sihamte yena allahara ibadata karae te'omra babe'i yena dbinaka ekanistha karae arau yena chalata pratistha karae arau yakata pradana karae, arau e'itorae'i haiche sathika dbina
Niscaya ahale kitabasakalara majara yisakale kupharai karaiche sihamta arau musbaraikasakala jahannamara ju'ita sthayibharae arasthana karaiba; e'omloke'i haiche nikrsta srsti
Niscaya yisakale imana aniche arau neka kama karaiche, te'omloke'i haiche srstira sraestha

Te'omlokara pratipalakara ocarata te'omlokara puraskara ache sthayi jannata, yara talata nadisamuha prabahita, tata te'omloke cirakala thakiba. Allaha te'omlokara prati santusta arau te'omloke'o te'omra prati santusta. E'ito tara babe, yiye nija pratipalakaka bhaya karae
Yetiya prabala kampanata prthiraikhana prakampita ha’ba
arau prthiraiye tara bhitarata thaka bojabora uliya'i diba
arau manuhe ka’ba, iyara ki ha’la
se'idina prthiraiye tara brttanta barnana karaiba
karana tomara pratipalake taka nirdesa diche
se'idina manuhe bhin bhin dalata ola'i ahiba yate sihamtaka sihamtara krtakarmabora dekhuraaba paraa yaya
eteke yiye anu paraimana satkama karaiche seya si dekhibalai paba
Arau yiye anu paraimana asatkama karaiche seya'o si dekhibalai paba
Sapata urdhbasbasata daurai yoraa ghomraasamuhara
yiborae ksurara aghatata phirainati urauraaya
yiborae prabhatakalata akramana karae
phalata sihamte iyara dbaraa dhuli urauraaya
arau iyara dbaraa satrau dalara abhyantarata soma'i parae
Niscaya manuha tara pratipalakara prati atikai akrtajna
niscaya si e'i bisaye saksi
arau niscaya si dhana-sampadara lobhata prabala
